description: This PHP file manages the web UI for a parental control feature, specifically for configuring managed services, trusted computers, and related settings within a network management system. It includes server-side PHP code for data retrieval and HTML/JavaScript code for UI interactions.

methods.name: init_psmMode
methods.description: Initializes page mode with title and navigation identifier.

methods.name: getStr
methods.description: Retrieves string configuration or parameter values by key.

methods.name: getParaValues
methods.description: Fetches parameter values for specified object paths, with optional aspect for translation or conversion.

methods.name: resolve_IPV6_global_address
methods.description: Resolves the global IPv6 address based on input IPv6 addresses.

methods.name: getInstanceIds
methods.description: Retrieves comma-separated instance IDs for a given object path.

methods.name: days_time_conversion_get
methods.description: Performs days and time conversion for schedule data.
